comments:
I20040310

Getting this reproducibly when trying to launch a run-time workbench with the
latest ZRH plug-ins. The exception does not get printed out, I have to catch it
at PlatformActivator::registerApplicationService.

Happens on an existing and a fresh workspace.

Hm, after restarting, rebuilding, reverting auto-changed .project files and
restarting again, this has gone away.
